definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Every option has its pros and cons.
sentences.chinese: 每一项选择都具有正反两面性。

sentences.english: Love and pain are two sides of one coin, the coin of your emotional life.
sentences.chinese: 爱和痛是人的情感硬币的正反两面。

sentences.english: One ought to draw the positive and negative historical lessons.
sentences.chinese: 大家应当吸取正反两面的历史教训。

sentences.english: Weigh the pros and cons of each choice.
sentences.chinese: 衡量每个选择的正反两面。

sentences.english: They argued the matter pro and con.
sentences.chinese: 他们对此事正反两面地争论着。

sentences.english: The history of the evolution of Yangzhou Pinghua's accents records both positive and negative experience.
sentences.chinese: 扬州评话语音演变的历史饱含正反两面经验。

sentences.english: Sprinkle some salt and pepper on both sides of each lamb chop, use chopper to press gently.
sentences.chinese: 在羊排正反两面洒上盐和胡椒，用刀背轻柔地压一下。

sentences.english: If I write an article, I generally receive a mix of positive comments and negative comments.
sentences.chinese: 如果我写一篇文章，我通常都会接纳正反两面的意见。

sentences.english: Each side of the cube has two sides: a front and a back.
sentences.chinese: 立方体的每一面都有正反两面。

sentences.english: Like anything, 64-bit software has its pros and its cons.
sentences.chinese: 就像所有事物一样，64位软件也有它的正反两面。

sentences.english: Two sides of imperial rule, no more, no less.
sentences.chinese: 我们正好是帝国规则的正反两面。

definition: reverse side/backside/the other side (of a problem etc)/negative/bad
positive and negative/pros and cons/inside and outside
the back/the reverse side/the wrong side
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
